title: How probe in 2017 Gauri Lankesh murder unlocked leads in 2013 killing of rationalist Narendra Dabholkar
selftext: Still waiting for the leaders of the conspiracy to be identified and charged for their crimes against society.
comments: RSS/VHP and these organizations related people

Watch the documentary Vivek (Reason) by Anand Patwardhan. The very last part goes deep into conspiracy theory and is based on one former policeman's theory. 

But the bulk of it is solid and covers this conspiracy and the ATS investigation into the same people and organizations which vanished after 26/11.
